pages.text: $(lunar)Moon Rabbit$()$(br)Adorable lunar creatures found in the Lunar Forest. They drop Moonstone and Lunar Dust when slain.
$(stellar)Star Spirit$()$(br)Ethereal beings that float above Starfall Hills and Lunar Lakes. They drop Stardust.
$(lunar)Moonlight Fairy$()$(br)Tiny glowing fairies found throughout the Lunar Realm. They provide light and occasionally drop Star Fragments.
